info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 4:27PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Somerset County through 500 PM EDT... At 427 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bingham, or 17 miles northwest of Skowhegan, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Madison, Bingham, Anson, Hartland, Cornville, Athens, Harmony, Embden, Brighton Plantation, Concord, Mayfield, Solon, Saint Albans, Moscow, Lexington, Ripley, New Portland, Pleasant Ridge Plantation and New Vineyard. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
